content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -18.5, 19.5), boiler (position -13.5, 20.0), and offshore pump (position -11.5, 26.5). The steam engine is currently not connected to the power network and has no input liquid.

### Copper plate mine at position(-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position -18.0, -49.0) which is currently out of ingredients to smelt.

### Copper cable factory at position(-21.5, 25.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position -21.5, 25.5) which is currently not receiving electricity and cannot create automation-science-pack due to missing resources: copper-plate (1) and iron-gear-wheel (1).
- Beltgroup connecting the furnace at position -18.0, -49.0 to the assembling machine at position -21.5, 25.5.

### Pipe network
Consists of multiple pipe groups:
- PipeGroup (fluid system 38393) at position (-18.5, 16.5) which is currently empty.
- PipeGroup (fluid system 38396) at position (-12.5, 21.5) which is currently full of water.
- Additional pipe groups at positions (-9.5, 21.5), (-10.5, 22.5), and (-6.5, 23.5) which are currently empty.

### Electricity network
Consists of multiple small electric poles:
- Small electric poles at positions (-16.5, 18.5), (-16.5, 20.5), (-16.5, 21.5), and others that are part of the electricity group (id 211715) but are not providing power to connected entities.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when extracting items from entities
- Ensure you are extracting from an entity that contains the item you want. In this case, the error occurred because there were no valid entities containing copper-plate at the specified position (-18.0, -49.0).

### Errors when using assembling machines without power
- Make sure that the assembling machine is connected to a power source before attempting to craft items. The assembling machine at position (-21.5, 25.5) is not receiving electricity.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it. This includes checking for existing entities that may block placement.

### Errors when connecting pipes
- Ensure that the pipes are correctly connected to the entities they are supposed to serve. The steam engine has warnings indicating it is not connected to a power network and has no input liquid.
